name: Jude
short_description:
As an AI language model, I do not have a personal experience or strengths to create a CV opening statement. However, I can provide a general template for a strong opening statement:

Highly motivated and results-driven (insert job title) with (number) years of experience in (related field). Possessing exceptional (list key skills and strengths) and a proven track record of exceeding targets (or similar achievement). I am passionate about (insert motivation or goal) and dedicated to delivering excellence in everything I do.

experience.title: Payroll Manager
experience.description: I was dealing a lot with Excel and payment process, so I was using the computer and several softwares everyday.

education.title: M.Sc. Finance
education.description: I completed a Master in Fianance and Payroll

hobbies.hobby: I like playing with computer and coding

skills.skill: reliable, attention to details, punctual, critical thinking, willing to learn, determined.
